Adventure Guildsman:
Finally established a place of sharing Ancient monsters in the surroundings of the village of Gludio.
Despite the danger of the case, is not this a great chance to show their strength now?
Rather get the High Prefect Drikus in Orc Guild in the Town of Gludio. Prove your supremacy and finding new strength.
(Upon reaching 38 level and above is available 2nd profession)
